KH.content: “Platonism” not only neutralizes Plato’s texts, inhibiting forces that continue to maintain a certain disorder (parasitism, ventriloquism, clandestinity, tone of denial), “Platonism” commands whole history of this neutralization, a philosophy would always be “Platonic”

LOBL.linkedContent: [Derrida does always affirm the word neutral, but here he seems to affirm Blanchot’s neutral] a neutral beyond dialectical contradiction and opposition

LOBL.content: undecidable, neuter, death is the undecidable itself
LOBL.linkedContent: undecidable, neuter, death is the undecidable itself

POOF.content: democracy—fraternization (brothers kill father): inclusion of women as sister, as a case of the brother [this neutralization an example of whole of political education]
POOF.linkedContent: democracy—fraternization (brothers kill father): inclusion of women as sister, as a case of the brother [this neutralization an example of whole of political education]

POOF.content: Zarathustra always called us, supposing it teleiopoetically, under neutral, non-dialecticizable law of pas and ‘X w/out X’
POOF.linkedContent: Zarathustra always called us, supposing it teleiopoetically, under neutral, non-dialecticizable law of pas and ‘X w/out X’

POOF.content: this friendship announced would have nothing to do w/ community: so that each X without X, unceasing neutralization of one predicate by another (relation w/out relation, community w/out community, partage sans partage), would call on significations altogether different from part shared or held in common
POOF.linkedContent: this friendship announced would have nothing to do w/ community: so that each X without X, unceasing neutralization of one predicate by another (relation w/out relation, community w/out community, partage sans partage), would call on significations altogether different from part shared or held in common

BL.content: law beyond sexual & grammatical gender, neutral

OOG.content: new reduction (epochē) developed in Crisis cannot be a forgetting or negating, a subtraction or devaluation of what it de-sediments or neutralizes
OOG.linkedContent: new reduction (epochē) developed in Crisis cannot be a forgetting or negating, a subtraction or devaluation of what it de-sediments or neutralizes

MSUBJ.content: subjectile, btwn 2 places, the subject become a gisant, spread out, stretched out, inert, neutral (ci-gît) [see C p. 234 ci-gît, “here lies,” cf. F p. 26]
MSUBJ.linkedContent: subjectile, btwn 2 places, the subject become a gisant, spread out, stretched out, inert, neutral (ci-gît) [see C p. 234 ci-gît, “here lies,” cf. F p. 26]

EM.linkedContent: purportedly neutral “metaphysics” [of Sartre] affirms Heidegger’s assessment that every humanism remains ontotheological [unity of man & God]

VM.content: Levinas describes es gibt as neutral unity of existence
VM.linkedContent: Levinas describes es gibt as neutral unity of existence

VM.content: Kant and Levinas both have immediate respect for other, but Levinas does not pass through neutral element of universal, nor through respect for law
VM.linkedContent: Kant and Levinas both have immediate respect for other, but Levinas does not pass through neutral element of universal, nor through respect for law

VM.content: for Levinas neutral thought of Being neutralizes Other as being; materialism is not primarily sensualism, but primacy of the neutral [primacy > archia > chief > neutral]
VM.linkedContent: for Levinas neutral thought of Being neutralizes Other as being; materialism is not primarily sensualism, but primacy of the neutral [primacy > archia > chief > neutral]

VM.content: for Hegel, sight is neutral, does not consume; for Levinas, sight is not neutral, desires, but, like Hegel, doesn’t consume
VM.linkedContent: for Hegel, sight is neutral, does not consume; for Levinas, sight is not neutral, desires, but, like Hegel, doesn’t consume

VM.content: phenomenological neutralization neither before nor after ethics and anything that exists [Aristotle’s “neither of nor against nature”]
VM.linkedContent: phenomenological neutralization neither before nor after ethics and anything that exists [Aristotle’s “neither of nor against nature”]

VM.content: for Husserl (transcendental phenomenology), “subjective a priori” only way to check totalitarianism of the neutral, impersonal “absolute Logic”: eschatology w/out dialogue [re: why finitude?] [revelation through faulty teletype]
VM.linkedContent: for Husserl (transcendental phenomenology), “subjective a priori” only way to check totalitarianism of the neutral, impersonal “absolute Logic”: eschatology w/out dialogue [re: why finitude?] [revelation through faulty teletype]

PAS.content: Blanchot unleashes what Witz contains or denies, a transparent, neutral, impassive surface of language of writing, beyond/before les lignes de rupture ou de front (psychoanalysis, literature, philosophy, political practice/thought)
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot unleashes what Witz contains or denies, a transparent, neutral, impassive surface of language of writing, beyond/before les lignes de rupture ou de front (psychoanalysis, literature, philosophy, political practice/thought)

PAS.content: Blanchot’s neutral must pass through very form of what it neutralizes
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot’s neutral must pass through very form of what it neutralizes

PAS.content: neutralization of sexual difference by calling her elle (anonymous, improper name), the de-distancing of viens instructs le pas de différence sexuelle; she is on the other side of the faux pas of the il that does not accompany me: neuter of affirmation, alliance, yes, yes, annulus of récit
PAS.linkedContent: neutralization of sexual difference by calling her elle (anonymous, improper name), the de-distancing of viens instructs le pas de différence sexuelle; she is on the other side of the faux pas of the il that does not accompany me: neuter of affirmation, alliance, yes, yes, annulus of récit

PAS.content: sans remarks same X w/out annulling it, springless spring (ce ressort sans ressort), this re-trait leaves everything intact (sauf, indemne) in appearance [absolute heterogenous neutrality w/out negation], at the same time it has abducted, erased, absolute rapidity of dispossession (dérapage)
PAS.linkedContent: sans remarks same X w/out annulling it, springless spring (ce ressort sans ressort), this re-trait leaves everything intact (sauf, indemne) in appearance [absolute heterogenous neutrality w/out negation], at the same time it has abducted, erased, absolute rapidity of dispossession (dérapage)

PAS.content: Blanchot neutralizes all the words of order of our modernity: meaning, language, discourse, writing
PAS.linkedContent: Blanchot neutralizes all the words of order of our modernity: meaning, language, discourse, writing

VP.content: Husserl neutralizes totality of world to phenomenon through transcendental reduction, thus arises the nothing that distinguishes parallels [trans. psychology from trans. phenom.]
VP.linkedContent: Husserl neutralizes totality of world to phenomenon through transcendental reduction, thus arises the nothing that distinguishes parallels [trans. psychology from trans. phenom.]

VP.content: for Husserl, imagination neutralizes memory, it is a non-“positing” representation, keeps w/in itself primary reference to an originary presentation; pure ideality to which neutralization provides access is not fictional, thus Husserl’s beef w/ Hume and his fascination w/ Hume
VP.linkedContent: for Husserl, imagination neutralizes memory, it is a non-“positing” representation, keeps w/in itself primary reference to an originary presentation; pure ideality to which neutralization provides access is not fictional, thus Husserl’s beef w/ Hume and his fascination w/ Hume

DS.content: deconstruction’s ceaseless dissymmetry (i.e. what Hyppolite calls Mallarmé’s “materialism of the idea”) works alongside possibility of deconstruction’s neutralizing moment, the “logic of the hymen” is neither negatively neutral, nor neutral at all

POS.linkedContent: gram as differance neutralizes phonologistic propensity of “sign,” liberates “graphic substance” > gram not an element, interwoven w/ traces of other elements of chain/system

POS.linkedContent: general strategy of deconstruction, its “general economy,” must avoid simply neutralizing binary oppositions & simply residing in closed field of oppositions

OTO.content: alliance in which Nietzsche seals/forges his signatures, and simulates them: demonic neutrality of midday delivered from the negative and from dialectic
OTO.linkedContent: alliance in which Nietzsche seals/forges his signatures, and simulates them: demonic neutrality of midday delivered from the negative and from dialectic

PS.linkedContent: for Blanchot, Artaud’s “unpower” is “essential to thought” > [Blanchot risks neutralization by making Artaud exemplary]

CHM.content: if language is the break w/ madness, the closer and closer language gets to it, it’ll be separated only by “transparent sheet” (of which Joyce speaks) > this diaphaneity: “language, meaning, possibility, and elementary discretion of a nothing that neutralizes everything”

CHM.content: thus, Foucault’s book a gesture of protection & internment
CHM.linkedContent: thus, Foucault’s book a gesture of protection & internment

RGE.linkedContent: Bataille’s sovereignty not neutral even if it neutralizes all oppositions of classical logic

RGE.content: discursive knowledge is neutral, neutrality has a negative essence (ne-uter), negative side of transgression

Gi.content: “transcendental dispersion” belongs to essence of Dasein in its neutrality

WAP.content: by naturalizing [the classroom] one neutralizes, conceals (dissimule), an active machinery, the structures, constraints, forms, settings (cadres), the parergonal, by which the dominating mastery, not neutral at all, centers itself: il n'y a pas de place neutre ou naturelle dans l’enseignement

PSSS.linkedContent: wherever there is law & performative, event has been neutralized, reappropriated by performative force or symbolic order

EL.content: what if there were no third language, no metalinguistic referee, no language in general, no [originary] neutral language? > what if the dialectico-transcendental hypothesis is already a positivist naturalization/neutralization of the supernatural?

FV.linkedContent: [re: Poe’s Purloined…] no neutralization possible when public corporation (société anonyme) of capital & desire inaugurates narration
